mapper.insert: insert into `dynamic` (uid, content, type, vordid, topical, vordid) values (#{uid}, #{content}, #{type}, #{vordid}, #{topical}, #{vordid})
insert into `like_info` (uid, hisuid, did, type) values (#{uid}, #{hisuid}, #{did}, #{type})
insert into `topical` (topical, counts, uid, intro, watch) values (#{topical}, 1, #{uid}, #{intro}, 0)
mapper.delete: delete from `like_info` where uid = #{uid} and did = #{did} and type = 1
mapper.select: select * from `dynamic` where uid = #{uid} and deleted = 0 ORDER BY id DESC
select count(*) from `like_info` where uid = #{uid} and did = #{did} and type = 1

select * from `dynamic` where topical = #{topical} and deleted = 0 order by
likes
time
desc
select * from `dynamic` where uid = #{uid} and content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and deleted = 0
